title: Exeter Heritage Escape with Cathedral Views & Rooftop Bar
description: A grand millinery store in the late 1700s, Hotel Indigo Exeter, an IHG Hotel has been lovingly restored to a treasure trove of heritage intrigue and modern-day luxury. Curated spaces are designed to spark imagination: the ocean-toned Retreat Spa transports its visitors to bliss, while Beckett's Rooftop Cocktail Bar is perfect for a breath of fresh air and a cocktail. Lovers of seafood can make a beeline for Colson's Restaurant for exquisite dishes including lobster risotto and Dorset crab tagliatelle.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Exeter, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 3 Catherine Street, Exeter EX1 1EU, United Kingdom
